name: 劉建宏
objective: 本課程內容包括：Android作業系統概觀、Java程式設計簡介、Android SDK應用程式開發環境與模擬器建置、Android專案建立與結構、Activity元件、使用者介面設計與使用XML的方式、View與Layout、Widget與使用者事件處理方法、Dialogs、Adapter與AdapterView、WebView、儲存媒介元件、多媒體撥放器元件、定位系統元件、Google Maps、加速感測器元件等等。
schedule:
(Week 1)       Overview of Android and its App development environment  
(Week 2)       Android project and basic Java programming/unit testing
(Week 3)       Android project and basic Java programming/unit testing
(Week 4)       User Interface and Layout Design
(Week 5)       Event Handling
(Week 6)       UI Components 
(Week 7)       Activity and Fragment
(Week 8)       Intent and Intent Filter
(Week 9)       Midterm Exam
(Week 10)     Content Provider 
(Week 11)     BroadcastReceiver and Services 
(Week 12)     Files and Storage
(Week 13)     Network Access and WebView
(Week 14)     Google Maps and GPS
(Week 15)     Apps of Sensors
(Week 16)     Apps of Camera and Multimedia
(Week 17)     Project Demo
(Week 18)     Project Demo
